response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering this, I'd like to propose an offer of $200 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to enjoy its benefits at a slightly higher cost than its market value. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 200}
